content: this versatile pattern will help you create four different styles of hat there is a beanie a button beanie a slouchy beanie and a slouchy button beanie four patterns in one you will want to make them all the hats are done in worsted weight yarn size 4 with a size j - 6mm crochet hook they are quick projects and suitable for an advanced beginner the hats are crocheted in the round stitches used are chain slip_stitch single_crochet decrease explained in pattern double_crochet and v_stitch the v_stitch is simply a double_crochet a chain and another double_crochet all done in the same space you will need one skein of worsted/aran weight yarn size 4 a size j - 6mm crochet hook and a yarn needle for weaving in the ends when you are finished you will also need a 1 button for the button versions i like to use caron simply soft yarn for this project the beanie hats measure about 7 1/2 from the top to the edge the slouchy beanies measure about 9 1/2 from the top to the edge the hats fits a head circumference between 19 and 23
